channel.title: How many missions does a summoning last?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "How many missions does a summoning last?"

item.title: Re: How many missions does a summoning last?
item.content:encoded:
Summons last 1-5 missions determined randomly when you summon. Wolfpack doubles the number picked (so you'll get 2, 4, 6, 8, or 10 missions). Also, there is the upgrade Village Memorial, which also doubles the number of missions a summon will help you on (or doubles again in the case of Wolf Pack)

Keep in mind that smokebombing a mission still counts as a mission but attacking a Kaiju does not.

item.title: How many missions does a summoning last?
item.content:encoded: And also can someone explain to me the wolfpack bonus, for longer summons
